title: DO NOT touch Morg's binding
body: I always have a coffee when I play league, but I never really get a chance to drink it before it goes cold.  Thankfully, when I get hit by a morg binding from top lane when she is bottom lane because of the completely accurate hitbox, I get a chance to drink my coffee during the 3 second root.  Thanks Rito for letting me drink my coffee.  Brink back the 3 second Fiddle fear and Rammus taunt to allow me more time to drink coffee.

3 Seconds is too long, but it should be a hefty CC considering how hard it should theoretically be to hit with it. Remember, Fidd and Rammus's were both targeted abilities (can't dodge shit) and hard CC (Morg's doesn't stop spells or attacks, just movement. Remember to right click the enemy.)

Yes, when you whine about everyone else until they get nerfed, you will eventually discover that Veigar is left and whine about him too.

The fear and taunt are targeted, so they offer little to no counterplay other than to just stay away from them, and Veigar's may as well be targeted if you're placing it on top of them. Anything longer than that better at least be a skillshot. Whether or not Morgana Q's enormous hitbox qualifies as a *skill*shot is a different question entirely.

Doesn't that mean that assassins should be tweaked, as a whole? I think Dark Binding needs adjustments, but the duration is fine. It just needs an accurate hitbox because frankly, you get hit by it when it clearly should not have. It's like old Nidalee spears and old Mundo cleavers.

ehhh the duration could use a knockdown.  Its the longest CC in the game now, which honestly would be fine, if it wasn't on such a short CD, and if Morg had no other CC to follow it up with.  But because she has another form of hard CC, and its on a 7 second CD at rank 5 with CDR, it gets a wee bit ridiculous

It's the longest CC in the game now, but its duration isn't nearly as ridiculous as some other forms of CC in the game, especially when you compare it to some other forms of CC, including Lux's Light Binding (2 second snare on first target, 1 second snare on the second), Swain's Nevermove (2 second AoE snare), and Veigar's Event Horizon (up to 2.5 second AoE **stun**). At least with a lower hitbox you would at least be able to avoid it without it hitting you when you clearly avoided it.

On top of which, let's look at what you COULD be up against.

Chaos Bolt: 2-4 second stun
Entangling Claws: 20% chance to root for 3 seconds on hit. (basic attack)
Bash (Abyssal Blade): 25% chance (if melee; 10% if ranged) to stun for 1.4 seconds on hit.
Overwhelm (Abyssal Blade): Active. 2 second stun, penetrates Spell Immunity.
Unstable Concoction: up to 4 seconds of stun
Sacred Arrow: Up to 5 second stun.
Adaptive Strike: Stun 4.75s
Stasis Trap: Stun 4s, AOE
Primal Roar: Stun 4s, AOE
Shackleshot: Stun 3.75s, up to two targets. Hard to land properly, though.
Stone Gaze: Stun 3s, AOE
Dream Coil: Stun 3s, AOE, can be avoided by staying in range. (It's like a reverse Morg ult. Stay near it to stay safe. 4.5s with Aghanim's Scepter.)


Really, it's just lucky that League has less disables than Dota does. If they were actually this long in LoL... jegus.
It's not luck that League has less disables than Dota does, it's good game design that League has less disables.

It's not an hard CC though, and Morg kit as laner rely entirely on avoiding enemies spell or shielding it through black shield and then rooting the enemy for long enough time to pull off the combo with her ulti
If you touch dark binding duration you definitively kill Morgana as laner, especially given that Black Shield strength was yet weakened a lot (and was weakened in the wrong way, they would have better touched AP scaling rather than base values if they wanted to avoid the morg bot going full AP)

Really?

Morg's kit consists of:
A root that deals most of her damage
An AOE-DoT that deals part of her damage
A shield that only blocks spells and abilities(granted the spell block is really good, but not offensive)
A multi-target stun that requires Morg to sit in the middle of the enemy team(can Zhonyas but still).

And yet you want to make its harder to hit her main source of damage?
